messages.content: Choose a sunny spot with well-drained soil. Sow seeds directly outdoors after the last frost (around April/May in London), 2cm deep and 30cm apart. Keep the soil moist until germination.  Alternatively, start seeds indoors 6-8 weeks before the last frost.  Once established, water regularly, especially during dry spells.

context: Last topic: how to plant a sunflower
